name: Woocommerce Order Report Snapshot
author: clickersonline

sections.description: This plugin will allow you to export orders in a date range, and give you a summary of the order information sorted by user group. Quickly and easily find out how many sales have been made by your wholesale users vs your retail users. (Or any other user groups you have created)
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Download and extract ‘wooexportcsv.zip’
  2. Upload wooexportcsv to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Go to WooCommerce -> Export Orders
  5. Export your orders!
sections.faq:
How do I install this plugin?

  1. Download and extract ‘wooexportcsv.zip’
  2. Upload wooexportcsv to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Go to WooCommerce -> Export Orders
  5. Export your orders!

short_description: Quickly and easily export Woocommerce orders based on user roles.
description: This plugin will allow you to export orders in a date range, and give you a summary of the order information sorted by user group. Quickly and easily find out how many sales have been made by your wholesale users vs your retail users. (Or any other user groups you have created)
